definition: national security (abbr. for 國家安全|国家安全[guo2 jia1 an1 quan2])/national security act/state security agency
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
abbr. for 國家安全局|国家安全局[Guo2 jia1 An1 quan2 ju2]
PRC Ministry of State Security/abbr. for 國家安全部|国家安全部[Guo2 jia1 an1 quan2 bu4]
to make the country rich and the people at peace
Hong Kong National Security Law (from 30th June 2020)

pinyin: Lian2 he2 guo2 An1 quan2 Li3 shi4 hui4

sentences.english: The United Ns Security Council tooksanctionscontrary to the aggressor country.
sentences.chinese: 連結國安了解對侵略國採取了制裁措施。

sentences.english: The United Nations Security Council approved a joint cease-fire resolution.
sentences.chinese: 聯合國安理會通過了一個聯合停火決議。

sentences.english: The Arab League hopes that the U.N. Security Council will play an even greater role on the Middle East issue.
sentences.chinese: 阿盟希望聯合國安理會在中東問題上發揮更大作用。

sentences.english: Delisting requires the assent of the five permanent members of the UN security council.
sentences.chinese: 撤銷名字需要聯合國安理會五個常任理事國的同意。

sentences.english: An evil is good, home and everything.
sentences.chinese: 國安千般好，家和萬事興。

sentences.english: Now it's possible, further down the line, that the coalition might go to the U.N. Security Council to seek additional authority.
sentences.chinese: 未來聯軍有可能向聯合國安理會尋求進一步授權。

sentences.english: Yan-ming of these issues is the National Security ads need to be addressed.
sentences.chinese: 閆明的這些問題也正是國安廣告需要解決的問題。

sentences.english: Lee has said South Korea plans to bring the issue before the United Nations Security Council.
sentences.chinese: 李說，韓國打算把爭端遞交給聯合國安理會。

sentences.english: Afterward, Li Zhangzhu exchanges fast horse Elvis , the country peaceful attack thorough speed.
sentences.chinese: 隨後，李章洙換上快馬埃爾維斯，國安進攻徹底速度。

sentences.english: Figure comes with UNSC Battle Rifle.
sentences.chinese: 圖配有聯合國安理會戰步槍。

sentences.english: A new chief of the security forces has just been appointed.
sentences.chinese: 國安系統的新主任剛剛纔被派任。

sentences.english: But the main diplomatic action has moved for now to the UN Security Council.
sentences.chinese: 然而，目前這些主要的外交行動都推給聯合國安理會。

sentences.english: A resolution is expected to be unveiled in the United Nations Security Council within weeks.
sentences.chinese: 聯合國安理會有望在數週內出臺一項對伊決議。

sentences.english: CSIS claims that Canada is infested with thousands of Chinese spies.
sentences.chinese: 加拿大國安局說加拿大有成千上百個中國間諜。

sentences.english: The U.N. Security Council has already approved three sanctions resolutions against Iran.
sentences.chinese: 聯合國安理會已經批准對伊朗的三次制裁決議案。

sentences.english: The United Nations Security Council took sanctions against the aggressor country.
sentences.chinese: 聯合國安理會對侵略國採取了制裁措施。

could happen at any moment/on the verge
to crack down on/to take severe measures against
